title: Inspect Underground Refuge Station
description: An underground supervisor performs a weekly inspection of a refuge station to ensure it is ready for use in an emergency.

tasks.description: Open the 'Refuge Station Inspection' checklist on a mobile device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct digital checklist is loaded.

tasks.description: Inspect the station, checking the supply of compressed air, water, and first aid supplies.
Notice that the pressure on an oxygen cylinder is low. Create a work order to have the cylinder replaced immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: A high-priority work order is created to ensure the station is fully stocked and ready for an emergency.
